original_text: I will not tell you to do things that are too difficult. I will not tell you to carry anything that is too heavy for you.’
korean_text: 이는 내 멍에는 쉽고 내 짐은 가벼움이라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: I will not tell you to do things
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너에게 일하라고 말하지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: I will not tell you to carry anything
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너에게 무언가를 운반하라고 말하지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: that is too heavy for you
